review: We've been using caviar for only a bit over a month now, and thus far everything has been fantastic.  It is ideal for when you are feeling lazy, and the delivery/gratuity charge is perfectly fair for the convenience.

title: Use this service all of the time
review: Convenient delivery with a better quality of food and customer service compared to other apps.

title: No complaints!
review: Great food, wide selection! Some delivery times are longer than others, but fortunately there are many options and to several popular places in San Francisco.

title: Great until this recent additional service fee???
review: Let's get back to having no service fee...I've been using only Caviar to avoid paying that extra fee. If it's here to stay, then I'm probably going to not order as much now..if at all.

title: Needs QA
review: I downloaded Cavier strictly to order Philz coffee ahead! Upon signing up I was given a promo for $15 credit! Because the Phil's order was under $15, the transaction did not go through! "You need $15 purchase to use your food credit"!! Then please give me the option to remove the credit and pay for my coffee!!!! It's been a few months and was hoping this issue would be resolve now!!! As a result, I have not used this app!!

title: Almost too convenient.
review: Like the service and all the options a available. Only thing I'd like to improve is taking things out of my cart once it's there.

title: Great App
review: This app is great! I've referred it to several people in y office and they love it! Refer someone and they give you a $20 credit! Need an option to tip off of card though because I don't always have cash to give the driver!! 👍🏽

title: Meh! It's okay...
review: It's okay but the surcharges add up fairly quick. I started using Caviar after I broke my leg and it was great. Now that I can get around, I don't use it as often because of the fees. There is a significant up charge on the menu items and the total is often 30-50% more than if I just picked it up myself.

title: Love This Service
review: Overall, super happy with the service and choice of restaurants.  Have had a few hiccups but nothing major and would highly recommend.

title: The best food delivery app
review: In my experience ordering in NYC, Chicago, SF and LA, Caviar is easily the best food delivery service out there. Awesome restaurants (the places you love or want to try), fast and helpful customer service, and a beautiful user interface. Worth checking out.

title: Overpriced, Selective Restaurants
review: Out of all the food delivery businesses, we only use them because certain restaurants go through them. They are to pricey. Today I ordered a $14 salad, and the total was $26, after all fees and taxes, excluding tip. I really craved the salad from the particular restaurant, so I dealt it out today. But I wouldn't use them as much as  I use Grub Hub or Postmates, which is a few times a week.

title: Great experience
review:
I really admire the app. You are welcomed with a beautiful interface that keeps you in the loop each step of the ordering process. 

The delivery representatives are friendly and offer pretty good service. 

I am satisfied.

title: Easy to use. Great service good choices
review: Absolutely love this app. Have used several times so many great restaurant choices and super easy to use. Way better then other services I've used in past.

title: Solid restaurants, great support
review: So much easier than combing through mediocre restaurants on other food delivery apps. App functionality is clean and easy, and support handled a kitchen error quickly and professionally.

title: So convenient and quick
review: App works great and it gives you and incredible variety of good choices. It's also faster than comparable services (I'm looking at you Seamless two hours for a pizza...)

title: Great food choices and service.
review: Might not have as many options as other services, but all are tasty. Service is great. Love that you get updates on status of delivery and can see driver en route on a map.

title: Great option for delivery
review: I found this app when I broke my foot last summer. Gives you more options for types of food. All of the couriers have always been delightful!

title: Fail! Bring back OrderAhead!
review:
Placed an order at a restaurant to be picked up at 5:15pm.
Credit card was charged immediately.
Showed up to restaurant and they have no order in their system.
Only got them to prepare my food without charging me was to show them the receipt that I'd been billed already.
Left the restaurant at 5:45 since our order was processed like a regular order so sat at the back of the dinner rush line.
After filing a complaint, got a nice e-mail from a customer service agent with an apology and a $5 credit which expires in 30 days.
The photos on the app all look great but in the end, it's all about execution. And it failed horribly at that, I'll take my business elsewhere.

title: Love it!
review: After a year, this app is pretty much the only one I use. The options are better and love the ability/accuracy in tracking my order/delivery progress.

title: Seamless; best on-demand delivery app to date!
review: No qualms, no issues, couriers are quite accommodating and friendly. Caviar does a great job finding a set of high quality people to deliver food in an expedited manner. I wouldn't use any other on-demand service.

title: Simple and Great
review: Better selection than the usual services that have been out there plus a very EFFICIENT interface will have your food to your face in no time.  Add the $5 referral credit and your golden!

title: Great Service, Great App
review:
Oakland, CA
Love the app navigation, very easy - only update I'd ask is to let the cart be editable more easily. 

Great restaurants participating, and really great Caviar drivers/delivery staff makes this my go-to over Eat 24 et all. Well worth the $5 delivery + mandated/automatic gratuity.

title: Excellent food delivery app
review: Best delivery times, easiest ordering, and all around great food delivery app. Would be great if you could search for food items, for example "salads." But still better than the competition.

title: delivery app and service we've been waiting for!
review: Hope they continue to add popular, high-quality restaurants. It's so easy to order, and delivery is quick and reliable.

title: Bravo Caviar
review: My go to for food delivery. Simple app, consistent prices and quality restaurant choices. The service has improved mightily since Square's backing - excited to see what other innovations they bring down the pike.

title: SO BUMMED
review: I've been using caviar for a couple of months now, and my boyfriend as well, and we are absolutely in love with it. We live in a kind of weird area of San Francisco and it was great to have better delivery options than what other services offer. We didn't even mind the fact that delivery is kind of pricey and slow. Today I opened the app to make an order for dinner and service is no longer available in my area. I'm so bummed.

title: Fast
review: The quickest delivery service so far... I have tried quite a few already and Caviar is consistently 30 minutes faster than the others

title: Sent me spam in the mail...
review:
A random flier arrives in the mail for this app for $10 off my first order. I download the app, make an account. Only to find out they don't actually delver to my address. 

Pro tip: don't send a potential customer mail if you won't actually service the address you sent that mail to. Never going to use this app even if they deliver to this address in the future. Boo.

title: Awful customer service
review: Terrible customer service. An hour after I placed my order, I hadn't received an update and hit the "request update" button in the app. No response. I reload the app and it says my order is canceled. No word from Caviar. After I contact CS they give a paltry 5 dollar credit, which basically covers the delivery fee and does nothing about the hour wasted waiting for food that was never coming.

title: They make it right
review: There are really good selections in the DC area, and when they had technical difficulties that kept me from getting my order, their customer service made it right.

title: cons outweigh the pros
review: The app itself works fun and good selection. However, BEWARE if you need customer service... they don't answer the phone and two emails - for a simple, small refund given a missing item in the order - also went ignored. No thanks. I deleted and refuse to give them my business. Same restaurants can be supported through other apps.

title: Very clean and user friendly
review: Of course there will be different menu items for each restaurant. Great service and very straightforward to use. Constant updates ensure excellent service.

title: Simply the best delivery service!
review: I have ordered food from Caviar over a year now and this app this very easy to maneuver with a lot of pictures and detailed information. Much better than Postmates and Grubhub.

title: Meh
review: Not a fan because the items I want from given restaurants usually aren't available. I can order from full menus with OrderAhead, so why is the menu so limited for Caviar? Also, the only time I tried to order, I got a call 30 min later saying the restaurant had already closed and they didn't know. I'm really not sure how this app is taking off compared to its competitors? Maybe I'm missing something.

title: Much better food selection than other food delivery apps
review: Very seamless and aesthetically pleasing food delivery app. The quality of vendors on the app is also much higher than of those on competing apps like Grubhub.

title: Worst company ever
review:
I made my first order ever and it came wrong. I emailed customer support and the response was "I apologize that the restaurant did not follow your instructions. We ask our restaurant partners to follow all special instructions, but it is ultimately at the manager's discretion as to whether they can accommodate them or not. We'll share your feedback with our Vendor Support Team to discuss with the restaurant.
So ultimately with Caviar the customer is always wrong.

title: Great user experience!
review: Amazing interface, intuitive site. Better food avail than any other delivery app, you're willing to pay a few extra bucks.

title: Works well for me
review: Little pricier than competitors like Seamless, but the value is in the high-quality restaurant selections that would otherwise never deliver. I'm a very happy customer---and you can track your food en route from the restaurant! That's worth it in itself

title: Best available delivery in PDX
review: Of the 5 major food delivery apps in Portland, this is the most reliable and has the best selection of local restaurants. Depending on promos/tip I usually spend $5 more than I would with a competitor. Worth it.

title: Disappointing service
review: After placing an order and paying a steep delivery and service fee, I was expecting a great meal. The food came soggy and sad, and one of our 4 items was missing. Normally this stuff doesn't bother me much, but the support response was slow, they only offered a refund of the item cost not a replacement, and at 41 weeks pregnant, I really just wanted a good meal.  Will stick with postmates, seamless, and Eat24 from now on.

title: Amazing app for busy moms!
review: I especially love this app those days I get home late from work and I don't have the time (or energy) to cook! The service fee isn't too bad and there are deals for free delivery once in awhile. Plus they deliver from great local restaurants!

title: A great concept.
review: One of the best food delivery apps around. The ability to order gourmet food from high-end restaurants that normally does not deliver is really convenient. The service is like an insta-date in an app!

title: After 2 years of happiness in the Sunset SF now zero
review: Used to have dozens of restaurants now down to 11!!!! Mostly Chinese which I could already get from Eat24 Now I am back to ordering from Eat24 or Order Ahead.

title: Great service
review: This is a great service but the mobile app is a little buggy. I can't remove items or cancel an order. It all seems to work fine through their website.

title: Better food options and fast delivery
review: Much better food than seamless, fast delivery and the flat rate is nice!  If you care about what you eat this is the only way to order it.

title: Great service, simple to use and fast
review: Caviar is a great service, I never had any problems with their deliveries, good variety of restaurants and the app has a very nice design which makes it super easy to use.

title: Incredible
review: Besides some flaws in the very beginning this app is great. Being as I work in the city and don't exactly get a lunch it's perfect for me since I can't leave the building for too long.

title: Way better than Seamless
review: This service is great and has restaurants I can't find delivery from anywhere else. And all they is has pics which is super helpful- LOVE IT, don't know how I lived without it

title: Great app. Smoothly functional
review: The only limitation I would like to see them remove: currently in only allows orders for ASAP delivery. In contrast, on the website you can schedule deliveries in the future.

title: Higher end restaurants with hi-res photos of items
review: As a long time customer of Seamless, I can honestly say that I genuinely love Caviar. GPS keeps me updated on where the deliver person is located. Great user interface and experience.

title: The worst
review: I placed an order at 7:21pm and did not receive my order until 9:50 PM. That's 2 1/2 hours! Of course by the time we received our food it was cold and gross. I called customer service to request a refund or at least a refund on the delivery fee and the man barely spoke any English and said he could only provide a $10 credit for caviar the next time I use it. There certainly will not be a next time!!
developerResponse: {'id': 790635, 'body': 'Thanks so much for the feedback, and I\'m so sorry to hear about the issue. We strive to provide the best experience with our service as possible, and clearly we fell short here. If you haven\'t already done so, could you email us more details about your experience with an attention to "Andy" at trycaviar.com/contact, so we can look into this further and help with a proper resolution for you?', 'modified': '2017-10-25T19:09:45Z'}

title: Poor cart persistence
review:
Order ahead refugee here. My biggest beef with this app is that it loses your order if you toggle to another app. 

I hit a second bug when trying to set a pickup time. Pick up asap in 20/30? Sure. Pickup in 45? Clears the cart, start over pls...

Devs: I work for New Relic. Check out our product for mobile app teams. Ping me if we can help in any way.
developerResponse: {'id': 278504, 'body': 'Hi NetGuyMo- Would you be able to contact our Support team so we can collect more info to troubleshoot further? They can be reached at trycaviar.com/contact. Screenshots and specific steps to reproduce the issues would be useful. Cheers!', 'modified': '2017-05-07T21:34:18Z'}

title: Best Delivery
review:
Great restaurants and great service! It's a premium service, though, and you definitely have to pay more!

Caviar is my go to app when I am craving a particular restaurant while also vegging out on my couch.

title: Terrible Customer Service
review:
The app is fine, the service is terrible.
Don't count on their estimated delivery times- my last two orders have been more than an hour later than expected. Customer service response was snarky, rude, and condescending- not a good way to run a startup.
The entire point of this service is to make reliable delivery estimates and timely delivery.
You're better off using DoorDash or Eat24.
developerResponse: {'id': 503912, 'body': "Thanks for the feedback here and I'm so sorry to hear about the negative experience with our team and service. We strive to provide the best experiences for our customers as much as possible, and anything less is unacceptable. Could you reach back out to us via our contact form here: https://www.trycaviar.com/contact, and I'd be happy to look into this further? Please feel free to write ATTN: Andy in your message. I look forward to hearing from you!", 'modified': '2017-10-25T19:09:45Z'}

title: Excellent!
review: Great, different restaurant choices and fast delivery! The expected time given was 45-60 minutes, but then it arrived in under 30! We will definitely be using Caviar again! :)

title: Good Food and Service But Oh, Those Extra Charges
review: This is a fine way to order delivered food, with excellent variety and speedy service but there are far too many extra charges added on. A $25 food bill can wind up costing $40. No bueno!

title: Burma <3
review:
Great for a lazy sunday. I just ordered from Burma Love and the food was delicious. I didn't even know they delivered until I saw it on featured section on iOS. The driver was awesome and she even called to give me a heads up.

I highly recommend!

title: Worst ever and good luck getting help!
review: Worst app ever! Soooo slow. Over charge and *delivery people they use are the worst and there is no way to rate them or hold them accountable for the cold food*. when you never get your food or get it an hour later, they won't refund you!! That's the biggest thing I'd tell caviar to change in their business model. Multiple bad experiences both in SF and NYC! Go with a different mode of delivery

title: I'll never go hungry again!
review:
Fast delivery, good restaurant choices, and very reliable!
I have had one goof where the food failed to appear despite being delivered. But I called and they handled it wonderfully!

title: My go to delivery app!
review: This is my primary food delivery app. The delivery people are always nice and friendly. The app also offers a wide range of restaurant options so I can have cheap eats or fancy food depending on my mood

title: Convenient but some issues
review: I've noticed that some menu items offered on Caviar is more expensive than when dining in the restaurants. Also some times are not properly vented so that steam can escape and thus some foods, like fried calamari come soaked in the steam condensations and become unappetizing. But the convenience is great.

title: Great service
review: Been using Caviar in Brooklyn for a couple years now. Always had a great roster of restaurants and reliable delivery times. App seems to have improved a lot recently.

title: How would I survive without Caviar?
review: This is a great app & service ! Easy to find delicious food, see when I can expect delivery, and even track the delivery.  It also has the best restaurants.  Thanks for helping me survive, Caviar!

title: Works pretty well
review: UI is fine, but it would be neat if you could search for a particular dish within a restaurant rather than scrolling and trying to find it manually. If this does exist, I haven't found it yet.

title: Good app.
review: I don't know how to cook. And even if I knew how, I would be too lazy for it.  I have tried many apps similar to this but only this is what i need. At any time of day I can enjoy a delicious meal. And it will be delivered as soon as possible. In my opinion, it's just great.

title: Great experience
review: I wish there were ratings for meals and restaurants but overall a great service. Delivery is very professional and super awesome to keep track of how much time and location of driver

title: Loving it so far
review: It has a lot of interesting restaurants participating. It's reasonably priced, offers a lot of selection and we've been very satisfied with both the delivery time and food so far.

title: Best food delivery service
review: I keep trying other food delivery services, but keep coming back to caviar. It is the easiest, most straightforward, with transparent pricing and time windows. It is by far my favorite.

title: It works perfect
review: It just flat out works. Delivery times are shockingly accurate. I like ordering here vs other app because Caviar shows you what you're ordering with a description.

title: Love this app
review: I had a first experience that went beyond expectations for delivery food. Price point is a little high ($35 for a small pizza and Mac and cheese, including delivery) but when the food came it was well worth it.

title: friendly service
review: I had an issue with one of my orders and called the customer service at caviar. they were very friendly and helpful.

title: Quick and Informative!
review: Always quick and very informative. You know where they are every step of the way.

title: Quality and service you can count on
review: Even when you're the one who messed up the order.

title: The worst
review: I have never written a review before, but this service is a complete joke. 45 minutes after the 50 minute period they already allocated for the delivery? From .5 miles away? I would never recommend this service to anyone that doesn't want to receive their food a week from now. What a wretched experience. No communication that the driver is running late or food prep is protracted. Atrocious.

title: Fastbite is amazing!
review: Caviar's new fastbite is SOOO quick and has been really tasty so far. It's a great option for a quick lunch when I'm starving and need something in the next 10 minutes.

title: Rip off App - great UX and design
review:
As a business model - Caviar should be ashamed of themselves. What they don't tell you, of course until you're hooked and have planned an order and are right about to pay - is there's a massive deliver fee you get hit with.

20%!!!!!! ON TOP OF ANOTHER DELIVERY FEE!!!! THAT'S MORE THAN IF YOU WERE DINING IN PERSON!!! 

Are you kidding me, this is such a rip off and pisses me off to using their product.

Strictly as a design and usage UX for the consumer - Caviar is great. But it gets washed over by the prices. 

BUT, this is New York City where there's a million options of places that offer free delivery. They should be ashamed of themselves. 

If you're the CEO, CFO, whomever, reply to this and defend yourself. 

What a joke...

title: Can't get delivery. Only pickup
review:
I used caviar a lot. Then once selected pickup. It won't allow me to go back to delivery now.

Edit per response: that makes sense. You should make clear in the UI that there is such a thing as pick up only zones rather than allow me to select delivery and then just not carry through my selection!
developerResponse: {'id': 278502, 'body': "H gentlemanbasil- Let's figure this out so you can use Caviar. We think this may be happening if you're in a pickup-only service region. We'd appreciate it if you could please contact our Support team at trycaviar.com/contact so we can troubleshoot this further. Thank you! - Caviar", 'modified': '2017-05-08T02:52:11Z'}

title: Very convenient food delivery app
review: The price is a bit high, but there's lots of local restaurants and it's usually pretty quick. The one I needed it, their customer service was super responsive and made sure to follow through.

title: Fastbite
review: The app itself is very useful, but fastbite specifically needs a lot of work. Every order has been 10-20 minutes late, which wouldn't be too big of a deal if they didn't advertise it as 10-15 minute delivery. On top of that they give an inaccurate ETA everytime and it's not just one courier, it's been a different one everytime.

title: Great customer service
review: Great food, love that they have catering options- perfect for office events. Only comment is that it would be nice to see on a map where the restaurants are located vs mileage (in Manhattan 1 mile could mean queens)

title: Love
review: I'm obsessed with this app. My fave part is that you can refer a friend. They get $20 off and you get $20 off when they use it for the first time. Major incentive to promote to friends and stay loyal.

title: Great, but pricey
review: But you already knew it was pricey, didn't you? Just make sure that the place you pick doesn't also deliver on a cheaper/free service like Seamless

title: Just ok
review: Was amazing when it first came out but the high prices hidden fees and limited menu options are going to ruin them. With the new companies on the market namely Amazon's Prime Now doing it cheaper and faster caviar will probably not make it and less they compete with the big dogs

title: WORST DELIVERY APP. EVER.
review:
Do not use caviar!! They charged my card and then never delivered the food. After 2.5 hours I tried contacting them and the only way to get a hold of them is through text message you can't even call! Anyway, come to find out they had cancelled the order without my knowledge and just never told me. They still charged the card though. 
JUST DONT USE IT. They are so unprofessional and sketchy

title: I enjoy the service
review: It takes a longer time to deliver than Chinese food, but the service is excellent and the options are great.

title: Changed my life
review: Best food delivery system in NYC- by far. Great selection of foods and always prompt delivery. Also, the delivery ppl r clearly better trained and more customer service oriented than Seamless. Night & Day better.

title: LOVE CAVIAR
review: Great app, great customer service. Use it all the time. One suggestion - make it easier to simply repeat a prior order from the order history area. Could be me, but I am not finding that shortcut.

title: Better than GrubHub
review: More user friendly interface than GrubHub, and delivered to me from restaurants than GrubHub won't because of distance.   I will use Caviar whenever I can

title: Inaccurate delivery times
review: Once a delivery is placed, the estimated delivery time always gets pushed back 20 to 30 minutes, sometimes even an hour. It's extremely frustrating when you're trying to plan dinner after work. Seamless and other options are more consultant with delivery times.
developerResponse: {'id': 926842, 'body': "Thanks so much for the feedback. We strive to provide the best experience with our service as possible, and clearly we are falling short here. If you haven't already done so, could you email us more details of your experience at trycaviar.com/contact? Our team would be happy to look into identifying the issue, and work towards a proper solution to improve future experiences.", 'modified': '2017-08-02T19:34:29Z'}

title: Gives out your personal information
review: This app gives out your personal information I've been called by the restaurant directly several times it's a little disconcerting. Who knows if there's even enough security on your credit card. Just a warning if you download this app.

title: So convenient!
review: Can get delicious food while staying at home! Restaurant variety is great! But delivery service isn't consistent, sometimes with nice hot food, sometimes is cold. Overall Caviar is very nice and convenient app.

title: Love it !!
review: I have my lucmh delivered to me at my workplace, and anything I'm craving Caviar's choices cater to my wants! Thank you for a quick, easy, and tasteful food delivery experience! I will recommend to even more friends 👍

title: The food came faster than expectd!
review: Not only that, the selection is quite great, almost everything i want is there

title: Great
review: I love Caviar and I like that you can track the progress on your phone. Experience varies based on the restaurant but I've found that it's better and faster than most of the other delivery apps and services in the Philly area.

title: Great Option
review: Great variety of restaurants. Sometimes the delivery map is off and projects a lower time but I use several times a week!

title: Don't try to use the "pickup" option
review: I never leave reviews but this just doesn't work. Trying to order Philz from the train on my way to SF and it only picks up Philz locations in the South Bay (where I'm a million miles from and it says it's using my "current location"). :/ And adding a new location manually just completely failed. App just doesn't work, I miss OrderAhead. :(

title: So convenient and great service
review:
The app and food deliveries offered are great! Good variety, good food, and good communication. 
Deliveries have been timely and delivery drivers communicate well. 
I always use this service!

title: You won't be sorry.
review: I love this app. I use it on the reg... Fantastic service and that includes "customer service" which is getting harder and harder to come by.

title: Nice app and choices
review: Great app with lots of choices and deals all the time. Low delivery charges too and I like the local option with even more lower delivery charges.

title: Best delivery service ever
review: The people and service are great! They deliver punctually and from so many diff places. I love that I can order from the Bart and have the food arrive right when I get home!

title: Love!
review: Caviar makes it so easy to get food from fantastic restaurants, even highly rated ones that are hard to get in. It is making life so much easier and yummier.   It is WAAAAY beyond ordering pizza.

title: Love it
review: Easy to use and has pictures of everything so you know what your getting. Best delivery app by far! Professional and well built .

title: Restaurants I love, available at home
review: It's an easy way to get dinner from restaurants that would otherwise not be available at my home.

title: Simple easy to use app with good food options
review: Plenty of options to choose from and have had several good experiences.

title: Amazing food
review: Do much better than anything else! Way better than the web experience too

title: Love it
review: I have tried other food delivery and caviar is my favorite. They have good delivery people that come right to my door and the quality of the restaurants is better.

title: Best restaurants and fast customer service
review: Tried many apps and Caviar had the best restaurants. One of my orders was slow and incorrect and I received very fast replies and fair resolutions. I'm very impressed.

title: Unclear pricing, Expensive, poorly designed app
review:
Poorly designed app: not intuitive. hard to use. Not even clear how to edit your cart, for example. 

, Expensive: Too many add-on fees. If peak times, sometimes your fees end up being more than your order for a group of friends.

Fees not clear at the outset: tax, delivery fee, service fees, tip.

title: Best of the Delivery Apps
review: Very user friendly. Never have issues. Time estimate updates constantly and is pretty accurate. Drivers are polite and don't linger with awkward conversation.

title: Easy to use - great service
review: Easy to use with clear, bright interface. Service is quick and the app informs you of every phase.

title: Best food delivery service
review: I think I've tried them all but for selection, speed and outstanding customer service Caviar wins hands down.

title: Great service!
review: Much better than postmates app-love the photos and you know you get what you order exactly- less chance of error

title: Awesome service
review: Great app and service, way better than door dash or Postmates. Nice because Caviar partners with all of their restaurants so coordination is better and the restaurants know who is delivering their food.

title: Love the offering, but Apple Pay doesn't work
review: When you use Apple Pay to check out, it says "done" but your order doesn't go through.  Has happened repeatedly.  Skip Apple Pay and put in your cc # directly - works fine then.

title: Caviar is fantastic
review: I rarely write reviews but I have to support Caviar. The service is great - reliable, seamless, no hidden costs, always on time with hot food, great restaurant selection. I order food 3-4 times a week!

title: I liked the service and the food
review: We didn't feel like driving to get some food so we ordered Mexican food yea it seemed a lil bit high but they add a delivery fee for a reason. As long as the food was good and delivered in the window it gave me I'm good with this app.

title: Yay!!!
review: First time user. Will be a lifetime user! I am dubbing this the Uber of food delivery: so convenient, a great use of modern technology, and really fast. Presentation of the menus is very well done (nice aesthetic) and I like the way you "track" your food. Yay for Caviar!

title: My Favorite Way to Order Foof Online
review: The app is easy to use and the restaurant selection is pretty sexy. Curry Up Now, Nick's Crispy Tacos, Green Chile Kitchen! I am crushed that Little Star Pizza is no longer available but overall I love Caviar's offerings.

title: Yasssssss
review: I know I've only used this once but I'm INLOVE. They delivered to me so fast, even before the time they said they would. Better than Favor who can't even deliver to my area.

title: Easy Delivery, Great Food
review: Simply a good delivery service with a curated list of your favorite local places. It might cost a bit, but you get what you pay for. It's called Caviar for a reason.

title: Great app
review: Has all of the restaurants around me and at a distance that I like- delivery is always quick, the order is correct, and the people delivering are nice and accommodating.

title: Amazing
review: I don't know what people are complaining about. The restaurants are awesome and service is amazing. I called once for missing rice and they sent a guy to bring me one thing of rice.

title: Fast service, great design, delicious food
review: Probably my favorite delivery app, it's easy to use, and makes it easy to track the food as it makes its way to me!

title: Great selection
review: Huge that they have options not available anywhere else. The exclusive high end offering is glorious.

title: Better food than Seamless
review: Great for ordering high-quality food from a range of restaurants. Just expect to pay higher prices too.

title: LOVE the pics of every item
review: I love that they have pics of every menu item. Great app. My only criticism is i wish they used a better map to follow the driver

title: Love it!
review: What a great app! They can deliver food from all my favorite restaurants in my city. So useful and great, I always use it when I come home from work and get too lazy to cook myself.

title: Already expensive, but now with surge pricing every night
review: Every single night over the past couple weeks caviar has been surge pricing (aka higher minimum). This already constitutes one of the most expensive food delivery apps (and their support is awful for all those fees). If they can't keep up with demand on a tuesday night maybe they should reconsider their competency.

title: Been great so far
review: Great restaurant choices for where we live in Philadelphia. The food sometimes takes a beating on the bike ride over. Seems to work best when ordering early dinner because the delivery folks do get backed up.

title: Not Bad
review: Ha ! Bachelor that I am I STILL live with college students, needless to say the kitchen is shambles, BUT, for the money, Caviar sustains me between GF care packages (=80% of the time) I'm not a fan of the semi recent increases in service charge or order minimum amount, but HEY, folks gotta get by, and for a luxury it's affordable...5 STARS !!!

title: Excellent options
review: I used to use seamless all the time, but the options on caviar are just much better. They even have some of my favorite Michael white spots!

title: Great app!
review: Food delivery from higher end establishments. Nice interface. Wish there was a bit more customization available.

title: Great Service; Crap App
review: This is my go-to food thing in New York. If I have access to my computer. Unfortunately, the iOS crashes constantly, doesn't let you add friends to the order and, when you want help, punches you out to a web page where you have to log in again.
developerResponse: {'id': 774318, 'body': "Thanks so much for the feedback, and I'm so sorry to hear about the issue. We strive to provide the best experience with our app as possible, and clearly we fell short here. If you haven't already done so, could you email us more details at trycaviar.com/contact, so we can look into this further and help with a proper resolution for you?", 'modified': '2017-10-25T19:09:45Z'}

title: Poor customer service and misleading coupon
review: Do not use this service. They claim to have a first time user coupon and when my wife setup and account they would not let her use the couple because the delivery address was the same as my account. Then their customer service was terrible when we complained. zero stars

title: Great service and app!
review: They delivery from restaurants that otherwise wouldn't deliver. Honestly some of the best restaurants in the city. Great service....food/delivery can take awhile so plan ahead.

title: No customer service
review: Very frustrating, hardly any customer service (email only). If something goes wrong don't expect to get any help. Use Uber eats instead if it's available in your area. Our delivery driver drove in circles for an hour for something that should have taken less than 10 minutes. Unacceptable quality of service

title: Quick, easy, and good takeout
review: If you're looking for a way to quickly and easily browse and select takeout, Caviar is the way to go. Hands down.

title: Fresh and fast
review: Never takes longer than 15 min and the food is always fresh!

title: The best way to get food delivered.
review: This is the best way to get food delivery. You get to buy from real restaurants, not just chains, and the food arrives really quickly and is well packaged.

title: Good
review: Very user friendly interface, fast delivery, tip is included in total price - very convenient for people like me who never have cash, good food selection.

title: Great option if we need delivery
review: Love the local joints they source and deliver for. They have a real curated selection of restaurants and we haven't been disappointed with any meal.

title: Restaurant open/closed inconsistent
review: Restaurant status is inconsistent across mobile site and native app. Native app does now show restaurant as open, similarly in past orders or search. Mobile site shows restaurant as open and order goes through. Order is then visible in app, but restaurant status is still closed.

title: I LOVE CAVIAR
review: This app is better than ANY food delivery service I have ever used. Delivery is speedy and prices are great. I've found so many delicious restaurants on this app!! I highly recommend it to everyone!!!!

title: Ordered at 7:39. It's 9:22.
review:
And the status of the order is "being made." It has been "being made" since 7:39. Not optimistic about my food getting here soon.

Final update: food arrived at 9:58. well over two hours to get my food. To be fair, the Delivery man was very nice and apologetic and the food was good. With that said, I've already deleted the app from my phone and will never use it again.

title: If they forget something, no customer number or redeliver
review: Have ordered four times now. This recent time, they did not deliver half of my order (the restaurant said they sent it with the driver). There is no contact #, just an email address/contact. Caviar refunded missing items but half my family dinner was missing and they weren't redelivering. Annoying.

title: Just great
review: If there is any issue with any restaurant (rare,because they work with higher end restaurants) caviar staff fix it and take care of their customers.

title: Quality service
review: Simple, user-friendly app, great restaurant choices, was delivered right on time & still hot. Would recommend!

title: Free delivery my азз
review: Got an email advertising free delivery all week. Got an in app popup advertising free delivery. Tried 4 different restaurants and all had 6 dollar delivery fee. Im not going to spend an hour shuffling through your app just to save myself 6 dollars on an order from a restaurant that i dont even want that much. Show me a list of select restaurant at least. Deceiving and a waste of time

title: Horrifying customer service
review: Overcharged me twice only to tell me that the charges would be reversed in 5-7 days AND i never got my food. This company should be flagged by the BBB.

title: Much better then postmates
review: I have used both. The processes and app for Caviar are so much better then postmates. I finally deleted postmates because they kept getting orders wrong, losing orders, and the support for Caviar is much better

title: Fantastic :)
review: This app is truly amazing! Great selections from our part of the city (Portland). Quick, easy, and we don't have to walk out in the rain for good food! A+ !

title: AMAZING!
review: I truly can't believe the service. It is absolutely outstanding. food comes very quick, delivery people are so nice. Prices reasonable. Would 100% recommend

title: Business
review: Beautiful photographs and a curated list of the best restaurants in NYC that I know and trust. Food quality has always been great, service and delivery times as well.

title: Good design
review: Clean and smooth flow. But the problem is the restaurants are limited and food items are not too much. But within time of dev it will be a good app.

title: Way better than Postmates!
review: Probably the swiftest and most affordable food delivery app I've ever used! Definitely my go-to food delivery app whether I'm at home or work.

title: No restaurant reviews?
review: Feels like Postmates, who is only in it for the transaction. Nicely "curated" list of restaurants but without reviews, it's a lot of back and forth to get quality food and service from ANY delivery service. Yet there are rare occasions when someone gets it right. You're not there yet Caviar. One rule: deliver hot food hot and cold food cold. If you can also follow directions that's helpful too.

title: If there's a problem with your order, good luck.
review: This company makes it almost impossible to speak to a human if there is a problem with your order. Our wait time for our meal was over 2.5 hours and they were unresponsive to email about any sort of compensation for the poor service. We will be sticking with seamless in this household.

title: Bad replacement
review: I used to use Order Ahead for my favorite bagel place. When I went and tried to order for pickup tomorrow it told me that Caviar was now in charge. I took the time to download the app and create an account only to discover than the bagel place isn't on Caviar. So they bought the old system (which worked great) and shut it down. Thanks a lot.

title: Nice promotions but limited menu items
review: Seems like they aggressively hunted the restaurants to fill up their app and then dropped the ball with making sure they were complete and accurate with the restaurant menu items themselves
developerResponse: {'id': 520342, 'body': "Thanks for the feedback here and so sorry to hear about the issue! We have high standards for our service and want to ensure we have this correct. If you haven't already done so, could you email our team more details regarding the issue at trycaviar.com/contact and we can look into this further?", 'modified': '2017-10-25T19:09:45Z'}

title: Stay away from Caviar at all cost.  Terrible.
review: Ordered food from Caviar last week.  Their driver ran into a retaining wall on our property causing thousands of dollars of damage.  The driver got away before we could stop him and get his info.  Calls, texts and emails to Caviar support are ignored.  Caviar leaves their customers high and dry.  All they care about is making a buck.  Stay away at all cost.
developerResponse: {'id': 164698, 'body': 'Hi JimmyJohn121212- We responded to all your inquiries and have been in communication with you. As advised, we need to hear from law enforcement with a verified account of what happened.', 'modified': '2017-04-17T17:37:48Z'}

title: SF drivers will not deliver to your door
review: 9/10 caviar drivers I've had in San Francisco will not buzz into my building, let alone come up to my apartment. This happens without fail, it's almost uncanny. I've had people make me meet them out on the street, or down at the corner. What is the point of paying a premium plus a delivery fee if I have to chase down my own delivery?

title: Lots of fees!
review: The app adds lots of fees to the orders. In addition, they sometimes keep you waiting up to a half hour for the restaurant to accept the orders. They do have a good selection of restaurants, but I wouldn't recommend using it when you're really hungry because their time estimates are rarely correct.

title: AMAZING
review: This is the best food app I have ever come across. From the customer service, to reliability to the EXCELLENT choice in restaurants. Even upscale, trendy restaurants like MOMOFOKU and such are part of the restaurants. Highly recommended.

title: Best food delivery App!!
review: Love the App, its a little pricey compared to other Apps, but the service and experience are way way better than others. this App is the best!

title: Beautiful!
review: I love having photos alongside nearly all the options. Great functionality and customer service.

title: Good app
review: Love the new group ordering feature! I use it nearly everyday to get lunch from anywhere! Great design and intuitive interface.

title: Way better than Seamless!
review: This app is amazing! Made up of independents delivering restaurant quality food super quick! So glad I bothered to change from Seamless :)

title: best food delivery app
review: No other way to get such high quality delivered so efficiently. Ordered from EN Japanese Brasserie and the pork dish was amazing because the pork came so perfectly cooked. Hard to believe it was delivery.

title: Such a good selection
review:
So beautiful app. Great pics of the food. Also good restaurants. Not delivery hub kinda places. 
It is expensive as there are fees. But it's a great serviceable awesome that you can track the delivery.

title: Confusing and unwieldy
review: Order ahead was simple and straightforward. Caviar is utterly ridiculous: expect multiple steps and menus to place a pick up order. You might think you've placed an order but wait, you probably didn't.  There's likely yet another step that needs to be taken. Utter lack of attention on consumer experience.

title: Great delivery app
review: One of the fastest and most reliable for my area. Great selection of restaurants too. Highly recommend checking this app out.

title: Great app wish I could tip by %
review: Great layout and easy to use.  Pics are helpful where available.  Online tipping by % would complete the pkg

title: Free credit on sign-up is great
review: Great app and service. Lots of options for delivery from local restaurants. Love the GPS tracking to my door. Use link to sign-up and get $5-$15 to use on your first order -trycaviar[dot]com/r/hajs2b

title: Incredibly disappointing
review: The catch? 18% service fee which doesn't show up until you are about to order. I hit send before I ordered and immediately tried to cancel my order. Was met with canned responses via text that we were out of luck. The service fee is thrown in at the end and mentioned nowhere throughout the app. Very misleading.

title: Works great
review: Great app. It has a lot of restaurant options which was a pleasant surprise. Easy to use and no problems. Really fast and intuitive.

title: Best Delivery Service in the bay!
review: Great restaurants and speedy service! I have never had an issue and the food is so hot and amazing! I get to try awesome restaurants without leaving the office or home. Way to go Caviar!!

title: Great app. Great customer service.
review: Had an issue where the address changed on its own and caviar took care of it right away. Caviar is my go to for delivery.

title: Solid app - Dreadful customer service
review: Caviar is a well-built app. There are no bugs, it's intuitive, it's clean, and it's super user-friendly. The issue is with the company's business model. They are investing in technology and engineering instead of CUSTOMER SERVICE. Seamless and GrubHub have the best customer on the planet, and that's why they will end up winning. In the game of the interwebs, winner takes all. Sorry, Caviar.

title: Great app, terrible service
review: If this rating was for the app itself it would be 5 stars but once you factor in the consistently under estimated delivery times, the frequency of forgotten items, and lack of customer support to deal with these issues it becomes a 2 star rating.

title: On fleek
review: I just like the service more than the other apps because it seems to be faster.

title: Just Use Seamless
review: I got a referral link that said I'd get 10 bucks off if I signed up. Signed up and no mention of these 10 bucks again. There is a customer service chat window. I asked a rep what I needed to do to activate it and was told to email them. So....what is the chat for? To be a trendy startup? Thanks, I'll just seamless.

title: Finally can order w/o calling
review: Love being able to order from places I prior to this had to call to order. Works great. No problems after several orders.

title: This food is the bomb
review: Just ordered my food and it arrived in 5 minutes. Tasted delicious. Only cost $15. This crushes other delivery services. I feel like I'm living in the future.

title: Essential app
review: Essential app for city dwellers who don't always want to walk or deal with parking. Good selection of restaurants that don't have their own delivery service.

title: Tension between restaurants and Caviar
review: Love the concept- much better options than seamless. Customer service is not where it needs to be - after dealing with my first bad Caviar experience I felt that there is tension between the delivery service that Caviar provides and the Restaurant team, no one wanted to take ownership of the mistakes made.

title: Get food from across town!
review: Finally! An app that willing to deliver further than places I can walk there myself!

title: Fastbite is awesome
review: The food in fastbite is really great, but I wish the notification feature that tells you when the food is ready again worked.

title: Love it!
review: I love Caviar. Great service. Beautiful interface. The food is always yummy. If you use a lot it ends up being expensive but it's certainly convenient!

title: Great service
review: Fast delivery and you can track it on the map - pretty cool feature. Restaurants are hand picked and food is good quality.

title: Amazing app
review: I love using Caviar.  Great service, inexpensive because of frequent promotions, and great options to choose from.  Have tested a few out and this ones the winner!  Thanks Caviar.

title: Excellent
review: Amazing service in comparison to other services that I've used over the last year.

title: Best food app ever
review: I use this app atleast twice a week. Food delivered to your door from local restaurants. Quick convenient and fairly priced

title: Easily my Fav Delivery App
review: I used to use UberEATS, but the drivers were refusing to deliver to the door, they wanted me to meet them on the streets. Way too sketchy. Caviar drivers are professional and don't give you any crap. I order, they deliver. Totally seamless.

title: Great service.
review: Love Caviar. The food is always great. I just wish they gave the option to request sides of sauces, because the sauces they put in the bag are never enough.

title: Essential service
review: I love it. Great responsiveness by phone reps, the website and the drivers. I use the app every Sunday ( and often during the week.)

title: Love it
review: Has my favorite restaurants and they are much faster than they predict. Each delivery person has been super nice too.

title: Consistently excellent food
review: I don't know how they filter their restaurants but 9/10 places I've tried have been fantastic.

title: Nice app, great food and service
review: Very nice looking app with some of the best Apple Pay integrations I've seen so far.  Great selection of food and quick delivery also

title: Great selection of restaurants
review: Finally an option to deliver higher quality restaurants!

title: Great!
review: Great app. Use this if you live in a popular area. Just got amazing food and I would of never been able to without this app! Thanks:)

title: Bad News
review:
They charge almost $8 for delivery $7.60 or something (call it service charge, call it delivery, it's still money coming out of my pocket)
Read their privacy policy before using them. 
Sounds like a secret agent with all it affiliates will collect all your data and post advertising cookies all over your device.

Be Aware, a fowl dishonest business.

title: Awesome app!
review: Caviar makes ordering from great restaurants so easy and convenient. Perfect option when you want to stay in but don't want to cook.

title: Amazingly Perfect
review: With a selection of restaurants that avoids the "usual" places, wide variety of items to order and flawless delivery, this is truly Amazingly Perfect!

title: The best!
review: Food is almost always on time and tasty! Customer service is great too, if and when you need them. Really love this app!!

title: Can't contact delivery person
review: I didn't see a way to contact the delivery person via phone or text which can make the actual delivery logistics more complicated. Other than that the app is ok so far.

title: Ordering Ahead
review: "Order Ahead" is now "Caviar". "Download the new app if you want to continue ordering food from us." Apparently since I don't live where you deliver I can't create an account to pick up food from the places I always picked up from on my way to or from my home. If this app is truly only for delivery, don't kill "Order Ahead."

title: Best on demand delivery app ever!
review: Always reliable with my favorite restaurants in both SF and NYC. I love the selection which ranges from Lers Ros, Burma love, Turtle Tower and Senor Sisig. Customer support is also super attentive when there's an issue, I love Caviar!

title: Deliciously addicting
review: I love this app and am happy to see more foods being added. Hope to someday see other places like Noah's bagels added as well.

title: Perfect for Busy Work Day
review: One click to Re-order is the best feature. Step by step notifications are awesome

title: Use it all the time
review: Great app, and the one time i had bad service / delayed delivery their customer service was very responsive.

title: It was great while it lasted
review: I LOVE the service I get with Caviar, and the prices...until now. Suddenly there's a $15 minimum, apparently for every restaurant. Now it will actually be more expensive than the other apps. Sadly, I will have to switch to Postmates and Door Dash. :(

title: Gorgeous App & Easy to Use
review: I really love how beautiful & simple this app is. Definitely will be using this whenever I feel like being fancy.

title: Unable to complete signup
review: I downloaded this application from Tapjoy and was excited to use it. Unfortunately I am unable to get past the registration form. After inputting my phone number I can't click the create your account button because it is hidden.

title: Greatest app
review: I am in loveeee with this app! They were right on time. The food places are a great variety and the drivers are extremely professional.

title: Caviar & Sosh for a better tomorrow
review: Caviar makes office life, chore days, and late night spontaneity easy. Sosh makes going out seamless and classy. I would be eating McDoubles every day if it weren't for these apps.

title: Great concept & consistent service
review: I appreciate the gratuity and service charges being included in the pricing. Delivery windows are always an over estimate.

title: My favorite food delivery service
review: I love the restaurants on Caviar that I can't get delivered from anywhere else! And the new Pickup feature is 💯

title: Needs order for later time feature
review: The app is great.  Just really need to be able to set delivery times like users can on the web.

title: Quick delivery good food
review: But I didn't see a place in the app to enter a tip. I belatedly got a text saying "thank you in advance for the tip". Confusing. I assume that meant you can't tip on the app so you should tip in cash?

title: Great service!
review: Food came within the expected delivery window. Will try again!

title: Lame advertising campaign
review: Got a mailer from Caviar for $10 off for ordering in my area. Since my hubby and I are foodies, we downloaded the app excited to order from some of our favorite restaurants. Logged on and gave my information only to get a message that they don't deliver in my area. Seems like a waste of advertising dollars to me.

title: Love it.
review: Great options when you've tried everything Yelp has to offer. Love the variety.

title: Quick
review: Great quality so far, customer service has been excellent.

title: False Advertising. "Deals" have unwritten stipulations.
review: Apparently you are supposed to just know that their "free delivery" deal only applies to restaurants that are 1 mile away and not 1.1 miles away even though it's not written anywhere. This isn't the only time their sold-called "deals" happened to be a lie either. Don't trust them. Will not use app again.

title: Convenient
review:
Friend told me to try this out, I did.

Saves me a lot of time and this is quickly becoming my favorite app.

title: Multiple cards please
review: Please have support for multiple cards so I don't have to edit every time I switch from home to work card

title: Way better than seamless
review: They have really good restaurants and the service so far work well

title: Like it!
review: This app has all the restaurants I like to order from and all others don't, so that's a huge draw for me.

title: Best of the delivery apps
review: Caviar has lots of competition, but clearly stands out by having an easy interface, Apple Pay integration, and lovely snapshots of each dish.

title: Outstanding Service!
review:
I tried this app for the first time and was impressed with its efficiency and technological capabilities. 
The delivery person was very polite, and the food was still warm. Awesome!

title: I keep using it!
review: I like that Caviar tips drivers (not Postmates). As I never have cash. I've found the customer service detail oriented and responsive. Nice touch.

title: I like it!
review: I like this application. It has really nice design and it's easy to use. There are a lot of points in lists with restaurants. Thanks to developers.

title: Excellent app - better than seamless and everything else
review: Best food delivery app I've used out of more than 10

title: Great app, great experience
review: Caviar is fast, reliable, and well designed. They have a good choice of restaurants. Definitely recommend them.

title: Whatever you want, whenever you want it!
review: Love the ability to get what I'm in the mood for anywhere I am.

title: Awesome app
review: Clean, easy to use, great interface works every time. Can't recommend it highly enough

title: Love it!
review: Caviar is the way delivery food should be...I love seeing exactly what I'm going to get instead of the guessing game with other services. Great idea / Great concept. Thank you!

title: Pretty darn good app!
review: I like this app quite a bit. The GPS tracking is a great feature. The only thing is it can be pricey but then again you're paying for convenience!

title: Great experience!
review: Very easy to use and service is reliable. Perfect for when you just want to have dinner in your pjs!

title: Love the service (in South Bay)!
review: I've been using Caviar for several months now. The delivery fee is reasonable and I like their selections of restaurants. Food always arrive warm/hot and ready to eat.

title: Love!
review: Caviar is the best! Great food and even better service. Cannot say enough good things about the app and the service as a whole.

title: Great selection and value
review: Always on time and easy to use and love the pictures!

title: Soy good
review: Quality food in a short amount of time and they send you food when they mess up

title: What happened???
review: Used to enjoy the service but now there are no restaurants available downtown at lunch time???

title: Love caviar
review: Really good food choices, easy to navigate, love seeing the pictures, makes choosing food easy. Worth the fee.

title: Five stars - food and app
review:
Loved the experience. Food was early and exceptional. 

App experience was clean and easy. 

This has become part of our routine.

title: Delivery from top restaurants on this app!
review: The best restaurants deliver on Caviar!  I also love Fastbite, the fast meal product in NYC and SF that delivers certain items in 15 minutes or less.

title: Best quality food
review: The meals I get from Caviar are much better than spoon rocket or munchery or sprig, because they deliver from quality restaurants. Refer friends and eat great food for free.

title: Always a winner
review: The food arrives on time and hot for a fair price. The selection of restaurants is great and continues to grow. No other food delivery site comes close.

title: So convenient!
review: This app gives you access to great quality restaurants delivering to your doorstep. It's an upgrade from the usual pizza and Thai.

title: The best way to order food
review: This is by far the best app I've used to order food and I order food like every other day!

title: Great product great curation
review: I love how simple and reliable Caviar is. I've never had a mistake on my order and the estimated times are usually spot on.

title: Pretty good but
review: Picnic options do not have the discount and it is annoying you have to call them to request it. Don't know why the app still isn't fixed. So two stars taken away.

title: Just Ok
review: It works well most of the time!  Expensive at times orders are cold and wrong.  However they are very quick to refund money for missions items.

title: Great first time experience!
review: The experience from downloading the app to placing my first order was amazingly simple. Really well done app.

title: Excellent interface
review: Easy to use - love having photos to make selections. Variety of restaurants is fantastic.

title: Good food right to your door
review: Before caviar I had to go to restaurants and order food in long lines. Now, the food comes to me! I love this app

title: This app stinks
review: I downloaded this app because it looked interesting. When I went to create my account I could not even get past the delivery address screen. There's also no way to contact support to work through the problem. This app isn't worth the effort. There are better ones out there.

title: Great app
review: Clean UI makes it easy to navigate options and order. Connected with great restaurants as well!
Fast service and easy to use app. Can't wait to see even more restaurants use the service.

title: Best Food Delivery App
review: I love the selection of restaurants this app offers and payment through ApplePay is soooooo convenient. Drivers are friendly too!

title: Amazing!
review: Excellent service and interface! So excited to see where it goes next!

title: Easy access to great food.
review: Caviar has additional options that are so much better than seamless and grub hub.

title: Great app
review:
I love the photos of food!!!

Sometimes the couriers get confused about addresses though. Also, they take a long time.

title: Reliable
review: Never crashes, always smooth, top notch restaurants and deliveries are fast.

title: Caviar is always great!
review: Better restaurants than other food delivery apps and quick delivery times!

title: Great Delivery Option!
review:
If you live in a metropolitan area and get delivery often, you will LOVE this!

Caviar steps away from the typical pizza and Chinese that's usually available.

I jumped on board as soon as they started in my area, so the delivery started out sketchy but has improved.

The best part is the wide variety of foods they offer.

It's a bit pricey but well worth it.

title: Favorite
review: I don't really use any other courier service due to previous bad experiences but I haven't had one with Caviar 👍

title: Love it
review: From all the apps out there this one is the best it is simple and has the restaurants that I enjoy the most

title: Good experience
review: My first order seemed to go just fine. But I'm not a fan of the hidden "service fee". What's the difference between that and the delivery free (which is currently waived for a promotion)?

title: Incredible solution
review: Never will i leave my apt again

title: Need more drivers
review: I keep making the mistake of ordering from caviar because it's convenient however when your food is promised in an hour and it really takes 2.5 hours is terrible (third time like this).  Next time I will just call the restaurant and pick it up myself (and save 20 dollars)

title: Can't delete order in cart
review: I've closed out the app. Come back two weeks later and my order is still there and can't be deleted. I can't even use the app if my previous cart is still full and there's no way to delete it. Super frustrating. App is fine otherwise.

title: Great app for ordering fancy dinner
review: Glitch-free app and handy tool for when you've exhausted the Seamless resto list. And since it's not typical takeout fare, the service and delivery fees are par for the course.

title: Me wuv food
review: The selection of restaurants in my area is high quality and it's very simple to order. My favorite food app.

title: Good app with foodie options
review: Easy to use, good pics and a decent variety of cuisines. Would love to have more mexican food options or even taco & food truck options!

title: Love, love, love this app
review: Easy to use, great service and best part is I am able to order from so many of my favorite restaurants.

title: Waited for ever for service in Silicon Valley
review: Disappointed there is still no service in the South Bay Area. I see door dash people everyone I'm out and appears they own the market here. I was hoping to try out another service.

title: Food waste
review: The app has a bug, when I updated my address and phone number it didn't save to their db. They sent my order to the wrong address, and after 15 minutes they forfeited my order. I called Caviar to ask if I could pick it up at the restaurant, and they told me they throw away all forfeited orders. My jaw dropped.

title: The best delivery service.
review: Quality choices, have yet to be disappointed. I was starting to get so dissapointed with seamless and grubhub, so happy I found caviar.

title: Great experience for great food
review: Always satisfied with the quality of food and service!

title: Yes!
review: Caviar is the best of the food delivery apps in the Bay Area. Decent prices, fast delivery, and good service. Plus they're always adding new restaurants to stay ahead of the game.

title: AVOID
review: Worst delivery service ever. Ordered Chinese food which was delivered freezing cold. Inedible. Customer service has no interest in fixing the issue instead offering a $10 credit to my account even though I spent over $100 on food that went straight in the trash. Use one of the other many delivery services.

title: No complaints!
review: I love seeing pictures of the food before I order it.

title: Cool app!
review:
Love the restaurant options.  High Delivery charge and I wish the delivery folks got higher tips... but good quality of food.

Also, had a bad restaurant experience and Caviar Supprt fixed it, immediately.

title: Can't favorite places you like
review: Love this app! It's great! Only problem is you can favorite meals/restaurants you like and may want reorder from. Other than that, it's a very good app!

title: Best delivery app ever
review: I live alone and order food almost every day. Caviar is by far the best app and offers the best service. Totally worth the extra $$

title: Great Job!
review: Delivery fast. Many restaurants to choose! All I need for my hot day, don't want to go out. Especially, they delivery alcohol to my house too! Awesome!

title: Fees on fees: and now mandatory minimum order
review: Just instituted a minimum order amount of $15 after originally touting having no minimum amount. This + the minimum mandatory delivery fee (in SF starting at $1.99, usually $5.99) + a mandatory variable service fee + tax you're looking at at least ~$20 every time you use the app, generally more without the lower delivery fee.

title: Great quality
review: So many choices, very accommodating to specific or extra requests. Fast!

title: Best food delivery service hands down
review: I've tried them all. The curated restaurant selection and ease of use is unparalleled.

title: Best thing to ever happen to me.
review: After finding out Caviar had an app, the saying "stay hungry, stay foolish" just seems silly.

title: Love Caviar!
review: Caviar delivers great food reliably. I've tried many other services but far prefer Caviar due to the quality of restaurants and the great couriers. Thumbs up!

title: Fantastic app!
review: Easy to use, intuitive UI, beautiful pictures, and amazing customer support. Get your yummy food now!!

title: Love this app
review: Great app for high end restaurants in Boston.  Delivers fast, app is easy to use, and the pictures of the food you are ordering is satisfying.  Love this app.

title: Dishonest reviews
review: Beware, fake reviews...I just downloaded this app and now I see a review with some of my information which is not only a security issue but dishonest on behalf of this company. In addition they advertise to service my area yet they app is telling me that service is not available to my area. So add false advertisement on top of that.

title: Awesome app!
review: Really enjoy using this. Great food, and a lot better than the other food order apps

title: Amazing!
review: You need Caviar! It has a great selection and the photos help when choosing what to order so much.

title: VERY IMPRESSED
review:
This was my first order and I was amazed at the speedy deliver. Not only was the delivery fast but I ordered ice cream and it was still in place when it arrived :))) will be ordering soon

Thanksss

title: Way better than bitesquad
review: Cheaper and they have a picture for every food. It's awesome!

title: Not happy with it so far...
review:
Food took twice the expected time to arrive. They promised it in 30-50 min and arrived almost 2h after we ordered it.

I contacted customer support and it has been 3 days and no answers.

The menu from the restaurants we tried didn't include a big variety. Only a few of the dishes that the restaurants have.

All the restaurants I tried didn't have the option to add drinks (like juices or sodas) or desserts, only food.

Still has a long way to be a better app/company.

title: Great food, fast delivery
review: Easy to use and the selection of restaurant makes this an easy choice. Delivery is usually very fast. Love it!

title: 'Atlanta' coverage is lacking
review:
Tried both my office and home address...right on the Perimeter/Sandy Springs. Both addresses aren't valid for delivery yet. I'm not sure what the coverage is, but if it's literally 'in the city of Atlanta' then I could easily walk outside my house and just go eat there; why would I ever use this service??

Not ready for Atlanta use.

title: Awesome app!
review: Very reliable and easy to use. I love that I can follow my food on gps. Great options but it would be great to have more. :)

title: Great and reliable!
review: I've been using Caviar for two years and I am very happy with the app and the service.

title: Piece of crap
review: I can't even order from a restaurant that's a mile from me for asap. I have to schedule it at least two hours out or can't order at all. What a piece of crap.  Not only that but the app is telling me I won't get delivery until Sunday. It's Thursday right now and the restaurant I selected isn't even open Sunday.

title: Excellent app!
review: Easy to use, accurate delivery tracking and great selection of local restaurants.

title: Fast service, great food
review: I use this app every weekend. Delivery is always fast and the food is always warm.

title: So far, very good!
review: Only 2 orders accomplished, and so far it's been extremely fast and efficient. Nice delivery person, too :)

title: Great photos!
review: Easy to use, beautiful photos of food! Can order in seconds!

title: Quick delivery
review: Yes it's expensive but that the price you pay I guess for not shopping ahead of time and not cooking. In other words laziness!

title: Nice app
review: Convenient delivery app. Nothing odd, but a very good app to order a takeout - lot of places to choose from, even in small towns, I guess.

title: Forget about seamless
review: Great delivery app.. Has a little bugs to fix but have amazing customer service.

title: Blows post mates out of the water
review: Much more reliable and many more participating restaurants

title: Good riddance seamless
review: Caviar is great. Fast and simple.  In nyc they do have a great selection of restaurants. Plus they have legitimate photos of all the food. Caviar is really well done.

title: Great delivery app
review: Easy to use, great selection, and they keep you up to date on your order.

title: Great service!
review: Caviar is a great app with fast delivery and easy interface. It will only continue to improve as their restaurant list grows.

title: Love the photos of food
review: I like that it has photos of all the food unlike other food apps.

title: Pure convenience
review: The best restaurants, ordered in advance and delivering on my schedule. It's fast, easy and awesome. Great, simple user interface and speedy service.

title: This Is It
review: If you simply need a meal from your favorite restaurant, and it doesn't deliver, this is the app for you.  It works. Every time.

title: Great customer service
review: Always one time and friendly staff

title: Quality Delivery App
review: Easy to use app for great delivery with expanding food options. Great customer service too.

title: Solid!
review: Great delivery service. $4.99 service charge then they add in tax and gratuity. It's less expensive than Eat24. Less restaurant choices though. It's reliable and convenient. I'm a fan.

title: Killed Order ahead app
review:
You replaced (bought?) Order ahead and none of the restaurants I ordered from in the past are available in your app? What kind of disservice is that??? There is not much left in Mountain View, CA.
Now I get a promotion for free (!!!) delivery and all restaurants are pick up only. Biggest ripoff in a very long time!!!

title: Nothing but praise for this app!
review: A+++ easy to use, delivery always faster than expected.

title: Excellent
review: I like service like this. It's easy way to get food without leaving home.

title: Horrible interface
review: This is one of the least convenient apps I've ever used. The user interface is not intuitive at all, there's no organization within the menus of restaurants, and the items appear scattered and haphazard. It made ordering an absolutely horrible experience. Do not download.

title: Great App
review: Cheaper and faster than most of the options out there

title: Beats Eat24 hands down
review: Good selections, easy app, very few restaurants that has a minimum of $20 to order. After 2 orders, I deleted the Eat24 app.

title: Promising but bugged for me
review: App finds my real address fine but then when you click Done it reverts to some random but similar address with no way to correct it. Basically doesn't work for me if it keeps dropping in the wrong address.

title: The best food delivery app
review: Caviar has the best food options that aren't available anywhere else. It's my go-to.

title: Awesome App
review: Offers more higher-end restaurants than competition. Easy to navigate.

title: Fantastic service
review: We have used caviar three times now and it's fantastic. Can't wait for them to add more restaurants. That's the only downside right now.

title: Slick app for great food delivery
review: App works much better than web interface on iPhone.

title: Best Food Delivery!
review:
Better than GrubHub or Postmates. Limited number of restaurants but expanding quickly. 

Download it and eat to your heart's content.

title: best restaurants, great service
review: been using caviar for a few years now. they have the best restaurants and great service. usually, my food arrives quickly and on time, but when things do occasionally go wrong, support is friendly, helpful and easy to get a hold of. highly recommend!

title: Used to be good
review: Multiple orders over different nights from places within 2 miles originally say they will be X time, then that doubles, then the courier drives 2 miles past your house, then they say your order was delivered while they're still 2 miles away. Save yourself a headache and download Uber eats or Postmates.

title: I miss OrderAhead
review:
You can't order ahead as the the app states the restaurant/coffee shop isn't open yet or that no items are available. 

If you could order ahead then you only get the half hour options (the 5 minute intervals were super helper for us). 

The playing of the order shows a 0.01 pre-auth charge. Why not show what is really being charged?

And when I used the CavPickup discount it looked like I was still being charged 1.00. 

Seriously disappointed in the OrderAhead replacement. This is not an improvement.

title: Easy to use. Great offerings.
review: Beautiful visual interface to help make your food choice quicker. And great restaurant options!

title: Worst app ever
review: So many frustrating times! Coupon never go through and service fees are expensive. After all, you will always find the delivery is not available after spend such a long time to find food. Never gonna use it again!

title: Delivery service always delivers on time
review: Delivery service always delivers by the time it says on the app.

title: Makes my tummy happy
review: Excellent selection of restaurants and there app just works really well

title: Can't find anything
review: My home screen shows me 5 Philz coffee listings and listings for restaurants 10 miles away. If I search for a restaurant nearby it won't let select and view it. This app is completely unusable. I used order ahead 4x / wk and I can't even get this to show me places I can walk to.

title: Amazing app
review: This is a great app that is designed for those who love to see visual displays of menus and have detailed order and delivery info- very sleek. Amazing job. 🌠

title: Better than grubhub but...
review: Too expensive!! A $15 minim is very annoying. If i'm eating with my friends thats easy, but i just had to order pancakes AND waffles for myself to pay off the  $15!

title: Fast with great choices
review: Really enjoy the service and selection of restaurants.

title: Inconvenient
review: Delivery charge, service charge, mandatory included gratuity. There are plenty of local services that offer great delivery without the cost of an arm and a leg.
